list.name: Changes
list.comment: chore: remove `pnpm-lock.yaml` file to declutter repository

task.summary:
chore: update IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
- Remove default `.gitignore` entries under `.idea`. - Rename module file from `sentient-cli.iml` to `raiton.iml`. - Update project dictionary with new words: `raiton`, `schemeable`.

feat: add process event handling and environment configuration setup
- Add `.env` file loading using `dotenv`. - Implement process event listeners for graceful shutdown with `EventBus`.

feat: add type definitions for core application structures
- Introduced various interfaces and type definitions to enhance application structure and type safety.

feat: add utility functions for SDK
- Introduced multiple utility functions for SDK enhancements, including `retryCallable`, `aliasPath`, and JSON stabilization. - Added artifact generation with `generateArtifacts`. - Exported functions through an `index.ts` for centralized access.

feat: add Swagger HTML page plugin for API documentation
- Implemented `swaggerHtmlPagePlugin` to render a preconfigured Swagger UI page. - Exported the plugin through `index.ts` for centralized use.

feat: add enums for SDK modularization
- Added multiple enums (`HttpMethodEnum`, `ParamTypeEnum`, `HashAlgoEnum`, `EventMessageEnum`, `TimestampEnum`) to streamline SDK code structure. - Exported all enums through `index.ts` for centralized access.

feat: introduce decorators for SDK modularization
- Added multiple decorators (`Controllable`, `AccessGuard`, `Graftable`, `Param`, `Body`, `Query`, `Header`, `UploadedFile`, etc.) to enhance SDK framework capabilities. - Exported all decorators through an `index.ts` file for centralized access.

feat: add constants for SDK modularization
- Introduced `SYSTEM_DECORATORS_KEYS` and `MICROSERVICE_NAME` constants for enhanced SDK structure. - Exported constants through an `index.ts` file for centralized access.

feat: implement SDK core modules and utilities
- Added foundational SDK modules for streamlined development: - `fastify.ts` for Fastify integration. - `responses.ts` for HTTP response handling. - `env.ts` for environment variable parsing. - `schemes.ts` for schema management. - `json.ts` for handling JSON structures. - `dependency-container.ts` for dependency injection management. - `data-transfer-object.ts` for DTO handling. - `services.ts` and `repositories.ts` for service-repository structure. - `controllers.ts` for controller base class. - `encryption.ts` for cryptographic utilities. - `routes.ts` for route registration. - `artifacts.ts` for artifact management. - `grafts.ts` for graft registry. - `throwable.ts` for enhanced error handling.
- Established a comprehensive setup to support SDK modularization and scalability.

feat: implement core modules for `Raiton` framework
- Introduced essential modules for `Raiton` framework initialization, including server, thread, and builder functionalities. - Added utility classes (`RaitonConfig`, `RaitonDirectories`, `ProcessUtility`, `Artifact`) for streamlined configuration, directory management, and artifact generation. - Integrated Fastify and its plugins (e.g., multipart, JWT auth, Swagger) for building scalable APIs. - Established a modular structure with support for Hot Module Replacement (HMR) and artifact management. - Enhanced command-line interaction via `RaitonCommand` and `RaitonCommands`.

feat: add CLI commands and bootstrap logic for the `Raiton` framework
- Introduced CLI entry points (`cli.ts`, `bootstrapper.ts`) to initialize and parse commands. - Added core commands (`build`, `develop`, `start`, `grafts`) for project lifecycle: - `build`: Builds the application with development or bootstrap mode. - `develop`: Runs the application in development mode with hot reload support. - `start`: Launches the application in production mode. - `grafts`: Generates typings grafts for schema management. - Integrated command registration and execution workflow via the `Command` class.
chore: remove `pnpm-lock.yaml` file to declutter repository

MESSAGE.value:
chore: update IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
- Remove default `.gitignore` entries under `.idea`. - Rename module file from `sentient-cli.iml` to `raiton.iml`. - Update project dictionary with new words: `raiton`, `schemeable`.

chore: initialize environment and process event handling setup
- Add `env.d.ts` for global type declarations. - Introduce `requirements.ts` to handle environment configuration and process event lifecycle.

feat: add process event handling and environment configuration setup
- Add `.env` file loading using `dotenv`. - Implement process event listeners for graceful shutdown with `EventBus`.

feat: add type definitions for core application structures
- Introduced various interfaces and type definitions to enhance application structure and type safety.

feat: add utility functions for SDK
- Introduced multiple utility functions for SDK enhancements, including `retryCallable`, `aliasPath`, and JSON stabilization. - Added artifact generation with `generateArtifacts`. - Exported functions through an `index.ts` for centralized access.

feat: add Swagger HTML page plugin for API documentation
- Implemented `swaggerHtmlPagePlugin` to render a preconfigured Swagger UI page. - Exported the plugin through `index.ts` for centralized use.

feat: add enums for SDK modularization
- Added multiple enums (`HttpMethodEnum`, `ParamTypeEnum`, `HashAlgoEnum`, `EventMessageEnum`, `TimestampEnum`) to streamline SDK code structure. - Exported all enums through `index.ts` for centralized access.

feat: introduce decorators for SDK modularization
- Added multiple decorators (`Controllable`, `AccessGuard`, `Graftable`, `Param`, `Body`, `Query`, `Header`, `UploadedFile`, etc.) to enhance SDK framework capabilities. - Exported all decorators through an `index.ts` file for centralized access.

feat: add constants for SDK modularization
- Introduced `SYSTEM_DECORATORS_KEYS` and `MICROSERVICE_NAME` constants for enhanced SDK structure. - Exported constants through an `index.ts` file for centralized access.

feat: implement SDK core modules and utilities
- Added foundational SDK modules for streamlined development: - `fastify.ts` for Fastify integration. - `responses.ts` for HTTP response handling. - `env.ts` for environment variable parsing. - `schemes.ts` for schema management. - `json.ts` for handling JSON structures. - `dependency-container.ts` for dependency injection management. - `data-transfer-object.ts` for DTO handling. - `services.ts` and `repositories.ts` for service-repository structure. - `controllers.ts` for controller base class. - `encryption.ts` for cryptographic utilities. - `routes.ts` for route registration. - `artifacts.ts` for artifact management. - `grafts.ts` for graft registry. - `throwable.ts` for enhanced error handling.
- Established a comprehensive setup to support SDK modularization and scalability.

feat: implement core modules for `Raiton` framework
- Introduced essential modules for `Raiton` framework initialization, including server, thread, and builder functionalities. - Added utility classes (`RaitonConfig`, `RaitonDirectories`, `ProcessUtility`, `Artifact`) for streamlined configuration, directory management, and artifact generation. - Integrated Fastify and its plugins (e.g., multipart, JWT auth, Swagger) for building scalable APIs. - Established a modular structure with support for Hot Module Replacement (HMR) and artifact management. - Enhanced command-line interaction via `RaitonCommand` and `RaitonCommands`.

feat: add CLI commands and bootstrap logic for the `Raiton` framework
- Introduced CLI entry points (`cli.ts`, `bootstrapper.ts`) to initialize and parse commands. - Added core commands (`build`, `develop`, `start`, `grafts`) for project lifecycle: - `build`: Builds the application with development or bootstrap mode. - `develop`: Runs the application in development mode with hot reload support. - `start`: Launches the application in production mode. - `grafts`: Generates typings grafts for schema management. - Integrated command registration and execution workflow via the `Command` class.
chore: remove `pnpm-lock.yaml` file to declutter repository
